name: Late For School (Praneil Kamat)
description:
Note: Best played in Chrome. Sound issues in Safari and Firefox

A puzzle-platforming infinite runner, about a boy in Tokyo who's clock didn't wake him up on time. Will he ever get to school? Hop, climb, and slide your way through the city to find out (spoiler: he doesn't).

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Air Dash Upwards - Space (whilst mid-air)
  • 8 Directional Air Dash - Space (whilst mid-air and W/A/S/D held)
  • Wall Jump (whilst clinging to a wall)

Created collaboratively as part of HomeTeam Apollo group. See credits in game for more detail.
